title: Maoriland movielogues. No. 10
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: 1.Rotorua Spa, New Zealand’s thermal spa. Scenes at the Sanatorium and Maori children diving for pennies. 2. Maoriland medley - in old New Zealand. To the accompaniment of Maori singing, sports, crafts and dancing are shown. 3. Rakiura, Stewart Island, New Zealand. Scenes and games on the holiday island. 4. Oddities - Moeraki Boulders, New Zealand. 5. Flying high over New Zealand’s southern alps. A flight of the RNZAF leaves Wighan Airfield, Christchurch for a flight over the Alps.
